etymologies: early 18th century; earliest use found in Discription Cockernonie. Origin uncertain; the first element may be related to cock or perhaps to cock (on account of its shape)

definitions: A hairstyle worn by (especially young) women in which the hair is gathered up on top of the head with a snood; the high gathering of hair in this hairstyle, or a pad of hair worn when styling the hair in such a way in order to make it appear fuller.
